title: Modern society;
author: Sinclair, Catherine
snippet: I feel like the strolling player who forgot  his part, and another advanced as his substitute, saying, ' This gentleman's name is Norval I on the Grampian hills his father feeds his flocks,' &c. &c. I shall, of course, be, as papa says, ' enchanted' to take Matilda north, and 'delighted' to act as show- woman of the lions at Barnard Castle : but she vdll find it odi-
